meanings.definition: To add more detail or information to something
meanings.sent1: She elaborates on her story by including extra facts.
meanings.sent2: The teacher elaborates on the lesson to help students understand better.
meanings.sent3: The detective elaborates on the case with new evidence.
meanings.sent4: His artwork elaborates on the beauty of nature in a unique way.
meanings.sent5: The chef elaborates on the flavors of the dish with a secret ingredient.

meanings.definition: To develop or expand upon an idea or concept
meanings.sent1: The author elaborates on the main theme throughout the book.
meanings.sent2: The scientist elaborates on the theory with new experiments.
meanings.sent3: The comedian elaborates on the joke with a funny punchline.
meanings.sent4: Her speech elaborates on the importance of education in society.
meanings.sent5: The architect elaborates on the design with intricate details.
